title: Mejdoo TV - Goodbye
developerAddress: Rue Montreal El Mechref Skanes 5000 Monastir Tunisia
description: Mejdoo was launched in 21 July 2014. It was an amazing experience full of love and inspiration. Unfortunately, today after 3 years, we decide to shut down the platform due to lack of funding for startups in Tunisia !Thanks to everyone who has supported us. Mejdoo has gone but new missions are coming soon.Goodbye !Mejdeddine BenzartiCEO & Founder21 July 2017
descriptionHTML:
Mejdoo was launched in 21 July 2014. It was an amazing experience full of love and inspiration.
Unfortunately, today after 3 years, we decide to shut down the platform due to lack of funding for startups in Tunisia !
Thanks to everyone who has supported us. Mejdoo has gone but new missions are coming soon.
Goodbye !

Mejdeddine Benzarti
CEO & Founder
21 July 2017
comments: cool j'aimerais qu'on met plus de chaînes partout dans le monde
